amendment.description: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to increase funding to VA Medical Services account from VA Medical Services account to conduct educational outreach to veterans to enroll in the burn pits registry, additional research using the registry, and other activities concerning the maintenance of registry.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ruiz amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. Ruiz.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ruiz amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.
